alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:01PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, north central Broadwater, northwestern Meagher and southwestern Cascade Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 159 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Wolf Creek to 8 miles north of East Helena. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Observed by Montana Department of Transportation sensor. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... York and Black Sandy State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
